locations.❌ [GET] /countries/{country_code}/govern: get all governorates in this country
locations.❌ [GET] /countries/{country_code}/cities: get all cities in this country
locations.❌ [GET] /governorates/{country_code}/cit: get all cities in this governorate

enums.❌ [GET] /{enum_parent_code}: get all enums child by parent code

system.❌ [GET] /currentLocal: get current system lang based on user auth [if no user auth based on default system lang]
system.❌ [GET] /locals: get all system locals based on locals table in admin panel

auth.❌ [POST] /login: login via [ login_via value from config file]
auth.❌ [POST] /registration: registration via [ login_via value from config file] is require input
auth.❌ [POST] /resetPassword: reset password via [ reset_password_via value from config file] to send otp
auth.❌ [POST] /verifyOtp: verify otp return bool [if return true user login success and must reset password ]

users.❌ [PUT|AUTH] /seenNotifications: set notifications seen by notification code
